trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero na <c>array</c> na qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia toda a coleção para uma <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional compatível, começando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o número de objetos de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup" /> na coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o número de <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup" /> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> objeto na coleção representa um elemento no projeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador que itera por meio do <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que o chamador usar o `foreach` instrução de linguagem c# (`for each` no Visual Basic) para iterar individuais <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> objetos no <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" /> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> caso o acesso ao <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" /> seja sincronizado (thread-safe); do contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso ao <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso ao <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection" />.
